text: Alston & Bird LLP is an international global law firm with over 800 lawyers in 13 offices throughout the United States, Europe, U.K., and Asia. The firm gives legal services to domestic and international clients worldwide. Alston & Bird has advised companies including Amazon.com, The Coca-Cola Company, Microsoft, Bank of America, Starbucks, Toyota, Dell, UPS, and Nokia. For the past 22 years, Fortune has ranked the firm in the 100 Best Companies to Work For list. ==References== Category:American law firms Category:International organizations
title: Alston & Bird
